abstract: A judge said that RIM and Apple had not violated Kodak’s patent for digital image-preview technology, because the patent was invalid.
snippet: A judge said that RIM and Apple had not violated Kodak’s patent for digital image-preview technology, because the patent was invalid.
lead_paragraph: Eastman Kodak lost a ruling in a two-year legal fight against Apple and Research in Motion over a patent for digital image-preview technology. The decision may hurt the value of assets Kodak is selling.

headline.main: Kodak Loses Patent Case Against Apple and RIM
headline.print_headline: Kodak Loses a Ruling in a Patent Case Against Apple and RIM
